full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 119 of 236 1023
LC3KMAX4 Parkinson - Direct
1 the cabana.
2 MS. COMEY: Let's go now to Government Exhibit 212, please.
3 A. You're standing south, looking somewhat northwest, and this
4 is the pool area. The cabana would be behind me to the left,
5 and the -- actually, part of the garden room and the lake room
6 is the partial structure to the right of the three palm trees
7 on the right.
8 Q. What is the little bit of blue we see just above the pool, through the trees?
9 A. That is the Intracoastal Waterway.
10 MS. COMEY: Let's go now to Government Exhibit 214, please.
11 Q. What do we see here?
12 A. This shows the west side of the residence, both the lower floor and upper floor. The right, larger, windows, is the garden room. The left six sliding glass door windows is the lake room.
13 MS. COMEY: We can go to Government Exhibit 217, please.
14 Q. Mr. Parkinson, what do we see here?
15 A. You're standing north, looking south across the pool, and also at the cabana.
16 MS. COMEY: Let's go to Government Exhibit 219, please.
17 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
18 DOJ-OGR-00012633

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and readable format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
